code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const News=()=>{const[newsArticles,setNewsArticles]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchNews=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("https://news.google.com/search?q=(Sasquatch OR Bigfoot)&hl=en-US&gl=US&ceid=US&oe=UTF-8&sort=date");const newsData=response.data.feed.entry;console.log('newsData',newsData);const filteredNews=newsData.filter(article=>{return article.title.toLowerCase().includes('sasquatch')||article.title.toLowerCase().includes('bigfoot');});setNewsArticles(filteredNews);}catch(error){console.error(error);}};fetchNews();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sasquatch-news",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Sasquatch and Bigfoot News Reports"}),newsArticles.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:newsArticles.map(article=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:article.link,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",children:article.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:article.summary})]},article.id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No Sasquatch or Bigfoot news reports found."})]});};export default News;
